attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Travel West Midlands are increasing the bus fares each year but are still failing to provide an adequate and satisfactory service.  

The buses are often late, dirtied with wrappers and cans and people are never stopped from smoking Cannabis on the top level of double-decker services. Music is also often played loudly on MP3 mobile phones but nothing is done to prevent it. 

CCTV cameras do not work on some services. A friend of mine was assaulted on the 79 routes but nothing could be resolved as CCTV cameras were broken.
